Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
White Rose Office Park is now firmly established as one of Leeds’ foremost office locations. As home to some of the most well-known and global names, the park has evolved into a true 24/7 business destination. Situated next door to one of the top regional shopping malls in the UK, the facilities at White Rose Office Park make a compelling case for any business looking to expand or indeed relocate. In 2021 The Park will be anchored by a
brand new train station mobilising people with a 6 minute direct rail link to Leeds city centre. With this will come a park expansion - currently branded as ICON; Innovation Centre of NewTech.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: VRF Comfort Cooling (1:8 sq m ratio) Comfort Cooling

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
White Rose Office Park is now firmly established as one of Leeds’ foremost office locations. As home to some of the most well-known and global names, the park has evolved into a true 24/7 business destination. Situated next door to one of the top regional shopping malls in the UK, the facilities at White Rose Office Park make a compelling case for any business looking to expand or indeed relocate. In 2021 The Park will be anchored by a
brand new train station mobilising people with a 6 minute direct rail link to Leeds city centre. With this will come a park expansion - currently branded as ICON; Innovation Centre of NewTech.

Excellent location in close proximity to White Rose Shopping Centre and imminent new White Rose train station. Within 3 miles of Junction 29 of the M62 motorway and 0.5 miles from Junction 1 of the M621

Waterside working at The Lock; 20,775 sq ft of fully refurbished offices set within its own landscaped grounds with extensive private car parking provision. Providing a rare opportunity for businesses to occupy a self-contained HQ office building. The Lock will have 69 parking spaces and will offer flexibility to sub-divide and accommodate a range of requirements between 4,327 sq ft and 20,775 sq ft. The Lock is undergoing an extensive refurbishment and enhancement program to deliver efficient Grade A office space.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Two Pipe Fan Coil Comfort Cooling

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Verity House comprises a 3-storey building with brick elevations and a pitched roof. It is accessed via an impressive glazed double height reception, which provides a great first impression to occupiers and clients. Existing tenant fit out which includes 4 x meeting rooms/conference facilities, staff break out area/kitchenette, reception area and comms room. Verity House is prominently situated on Canal Wharf and fronts the popular Granary Wharf development. The property is a matter of minutes away from Leeds Station’s southern entrance and is well linked to the M621 and M1 motorways, making it highly accessible. The city’s retail and leisure offerings are within walking distance, with plenty more options available on the developing south bank.

ONE EMBANKMENT benefits from being located at the southern gateway to the city centre, 2 minutes walk from the new southern entrance to Leeds city railway station. ONE Embankment offers cost effective refurbished office space with basement car parking on highly flexible lease terms. Arranged over Lower Ground, Ground and 4 upper floors, the building provides floor plates from 3,957 - 13,171 sq ft wrapped around a new landscaped courtyard. The Southern elevation also enjoys attractive views of the river Aire. The reception area provides an impressive double height glazed entrance with meeting rooms and client space available to hire for all occupiers. Car parking is provided in the basement.

2 Brewery Wharf benefits from a stylish and modern design with Grade A office accommodation over five floors. Its fully glazed facade makes it one of the most striking buildings in Brewery Wharf. The specification of the accommodation available is as follows: prestigious reception, two eight person passenger lift, comfort cooling, 150mm raised access floor, suspended ceiling incorporating LG7 lighting, floor to ceiling windows, two fully glazed board rooms and meeting rooms, kitchen point, male, female and disabled toilets, 7 car parking spaces, secure basement storage and communal shower.

Chantrell Court is located at the eastern end of The Calls. It is in close proximity to the popular riverside areas of Clarence Dock and Brewery Wharf and is ideally located for any business wishing to be within walking distance of Leeds City Station and the main retail area. The property is easily accessed via The Calls and close links to the A61 ring road. The property is a self contained building with office accommodation over three floors.

With a stunning art deco façade, the former well known bar ‘The Elbow Rooms’ is currently undergoing a comprehensive refurbishment to provide high quality office accommodation over the second and third floors. The offices will be accessed from Call Lane via a new striking reception. The Elbow Rooms will be sympathetically refurbished to maintain many of its original features with exposed soffits and beams. The Elbow Rooms is located within the vibrant Calls area of Leeds City Centre. The Calls are host to numerous characterful offices, apartments, hotels, restaurants and bars. The offices benefit from being within a 5 minute walk of Leeds City Train Station and the Leeds retail quarter. The Elbow Rooms fronts the Leeds Inner Ring Road, which in turn provides access to the national motorway network meaning the Elbow rooms is perfectly situated in terms of accessibility.

Platform represents a major strategic development for the city, being in the heart of Leeds, as well as being plugged directly into the regional and national transport network. Platform stands above the city’s mainline railway station boasting 13 stories. You have complete flexibility to shape the style and character of your workspace to suit your brand and can be safe in the knowledge that the building has the highest standards. Platform provides a tech hub of hot desk spaces, dedicated co-working areas and studio offices for 2–20 people with additional roof terrace facilities with all the amenities of Leeds on its doorstep.

1 Whitehall Riverside is approached through a stunning full height atrium with a manned reception, which provides a lift service to all floors. The main envelope of the building is of steel frame construction, which is clad externally with curtain walling incorporating double glazed windows, providing an abundance of natural light. The subject suite is situated at 4th floor level and provides a unique opportunity to acquire a suite within one of Leeds
most prominent buildings. 1 Whitehall Riverside is prominently situated on Whitehall Road within the West End District of Leeds City Centre and benefits from waterside frontage to the River Aire. Leeds City station and the retail quarter are both within a short walk of Whitehall Riverside.

1 Whitehall Riverside is approached through a stunning full height atrium with a manned reception, which provides a lift service to all floors. The main envelope of the building is of steel frame construction, which is clad externally with curtain walling incorporating double glazed windows, providing an abundance of natural light. The subject suite is situated at 4th floor level and provides a unique opportunity to acquire a suite within one of Leeds
most prominent buildings. 1 Whitehall Riverside is prominently situated on Whitehall Road within the West End District of Leeds City Centre and benefits from waterside frontage to the River Aire. Leeds City station and the retail quarter are both within a short walk of Whitehall Riverside.

The Bourse is a Grade II Listed mixed use development in Leeds City Centre. The property fronts Boar Lane that has a variety of commercial uses along it. The office is ideally located for any business wishing to be within walking distance of Leeds City Station and the main retail area. The property is less than 2 minutes walk from the station. The property is a Grade II listed stone built building in the centre. Office accommodation is over four floors and we have sub lease available for 2nd and 3rd floor in the building approx. 8,000 sq ft

Whitehall II is located on the corner of Whitehall Road and Whitehall Quay in the heart of Leeds City Centre. Whitehall II was the final phase of a large mixed use development adjacent to the River Aire which comprises, residential apartments, offices, hotel accommodation, and leisure amenities set within mature landscaped surroundings. Leeds City Railway Station is situated a two minute walk away. Whitehall II is a purpose built multi-let 6 storey office building which boasts many features to include a striking double height glazed reception.

10 Wellington Place comprises a 5-storey steel framed building with glazed and stone elevations. The building provides leisure and office accommodation at ground floor level and office accommodation over the 4 upper floors. The office accommodation is accessed via a well-presented manned reception that fronts the iconic Wellington Place lifting tower. The reception leads to two passenger lifts that serve the upper floors. Male/Female toilets, Showers and disabled WC’s are located on each floor. 10 Wellington Place is located on the successful Wellington Place development that fronts Wellington Street and Whitehall Road, two of the main arterial routes into the City Centre. The scheme is the epicentre of Leeds West End commercial district and benefits from being within a 7-minute walk of Leeds Train Station and is also within a 10-minute walk of the main retail core. Wellington Place is regarded as one of the premier office locations in the city and is home to Sky Betting and Gaming, Willis Towers Watson, Equifax, Irwin Mitchell, HMRC, Ministry of Justice, Mazars, Buro Happold, Ward Hadaway and Squire Patton Boggs. There’s also an abundance of amenities with a number of restaurants, bars, a gym and a Sainsburys convenience store all located on site. All of the aforementioned makes 10 Wellington Place an extremely desirable location for the modern office occupier who want the best amenities and working environment to enable them to retain and attract the best staff.

Prominently situated overlooking City Square, boasting the best business address in Leeds, opposite Leeds Railway Station, One City Square One City Square is centrally placed for business. Leeds Railway Station can be seen from the front entrance of the building and Trinity Leeds and the main retail core are less than a minutes walk away so whether it be an easy commute, a bite to eat or shopping at lunch or drinks after work, the building is
ideally located to cater for all needs.is an iconic, landmark building at the centre of the business core. One City Square certainly does not go unnoticed with its striking architecture including ‘wall climber’ lifts and an impressive full height atrium. A recent comprehensive refurbishment has resulted in the building offering the highest quality, flexible office accommodation in it’s location. One City Square is centrally placed for business. Leeds Railway Station can be seen from the front entrance of the building and Trinity Leeds and the main retail core are less than a minutes walk away so whether it be an easy commute, a bite to eat or shopping at lunch or drinks after work, the building is ideally located to cater for all needs.

With full height floor-to-ceiling glazing, air conditioning and raised floors the available suites are truly Grade A and provides prime office space. City Exchange provides fantastic office accommodation within a landmark city centre building. The property is located just two minutes walk from Leeds
City Station and on the doorstep of Leeds’ premier shopping centre in the heart of the city. With 120 national and international brands under one roof, Trinity Leeds is the city’s go to retail, dining, leisure and entertainment destination.
Stunning Grade A offices in the heart of the City Centre providing BREEAM Excellent accommodation with on-site parking.

Prominently located on Wellington Street, West One provides easy access by car and public transport alike. West One benefits from an on-site secure multi-storey car park and is situated close to the inner ring road leading to the M62/M1 and the wider motorway network beyond. Leeds railway station is within a short walking distance with rail services to London every half hour taking a little over 2 hours.  The accommodation available to let benefits from the following specification: open plan suites, air conditioning, raised access floors, 24 hour access, suspended ceilings, LG7-compliant lighting and DDA compliant access.  Amenities on site consist of:  on site customer service team, large reception and lounge area, meeting and conference facilities, on site parking available, secure bicycle storage, shower and locker facilities, on site gym, on site sandwich shops and amenities plus lifts to all floors.

Standing proud and prominent on Park Row is Leeds’ newest office development. Having recently undergone a complete transformation, 7 Park Row comprises 40,861 sq ft of Grade A+ accommodation and has been developed with today’s businesses in mind. Park Row is the City’s most sought after business location, benefiting from being perfectly placed centrally between Leeds’ Central Business District and Retail Core. You and your staff will have all that you need to enjoy a work-life balance. Park Row is the most prestigious office destination in Leeds and many businesses aspire to being located here. Established and well known occupiers with offices on Park Row include Pinsent Masons, Deloitte, Barclays and Rothschild. Furthermore, Park Row is ideally located to benefit from the city’s numerous retail and leisure amenities and fantastic communication links.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: GRADE A+ OFFICE ACCOMMODATION DESIGNED FOR THE FORWARD THINKING OCCUPIER

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: With frontages to East Parade and Infirmary Street and overlooking Bond Court, Capitol is ideally located for any business wishing to be within a few minutes stroll of Leeds City Station and the main City Centre retail area. The property also benefits from being within a short walk of a plethora of eating and drinking establishments. The prominent 7 storey office building has been recently refurbished.

8 Park Row provides Grade A offices in the heart of the city centre some 2 minutes walk from Leeds railway station. The property is undergoing an extensive refurbishment with completion due in 2021. 8 Park Row benefits from occupying one of the City's prime business addresses. It is some 3 minutes walk from Leeds Station and adjacent to Leeds' prime shopping district providing excellent staff amenities including adjacent occupiers such as Head of Steam, Boots, Tesco Metro and Pret a Manger. Park Row is home to numerous banks, bars & restaurants.

6 East Parade offers occupiers an unrivalled address and a enviable working environment. It is located in the heart of the commercial and financial district of Leeds City Centre fronting East Parade, which forms part of the City’s loop road network. Situated only a 3 minute walk from Leeds Train Station and a 5 minute stroll from the Trinity Shopping Centre, 6 East Parade provides the perfect staff and customer experience. The property has undergone a £3.5m redevelopment programme to provide stunning Grade A office accommodation, over 7 floors, with secure basement parking
and external courtyard.

The property is set over 5 floors and overlooks the popular Greek Street area of Leeds. The office accommodation can be accessed from East Parade or Greek Street via an impressive glazed entrance. Yorkshire House is prominently situated on the corner of East Parade and Greek Street within Leeds business district. The property benefits from a 4-minute walk to Leeds Railway Station and is a short drive from the M621 motorway, making the property highly accessible. The city’s retail, bar and restaurant offerings are a matter of minutes away, ensuring that Yorkshire House is well located to provide a good work life balance.

West Gate is situated close to the inner ring road leading to the M26/M1 and the wider motorway network. West Gate is opposite the Crown Court and Magistrates Court and close to a number of high profile businesses. Leeds railway station is within a short walking distance with rail services to London every half hour taking a little over two hours. West Gate gives the ultimate flexibility in how you maximize the space available to your business. The building is ideal for occupiers looking for a space that can house their operations in a single suite.

The office suite comprises the second floor of a two storey brick built property. The premises consist of a sole use lobby/entrance, a kitchen point and shared w/c facilities. Access to the second floor suite is from a secure door just off of the main Cookridge Road to the side of the property. Occupiers would have 24 hours a day, 7 days a week access to the building via a fob/Key entry system. Cookridge Chambers are positioned on Cookridge Street, within reach of both the prime office core and the main retail area of Leeds city centre. The property is within a ten minute walk of the train station, serviced by multiple bus routes and has access to copious parking facilities. The property is situated just off the The Headrow which provides direct access to the extensive motorway network.

Located in the heart of Leeds city centre, Town Centre House clearly shows how a firm commitments to a sustainable future can be realised in over 40,000 sq ft of high quality office accommodation. Town Centre House (TCH) is the chosen head office of Town Centre Securities PLC and has attracted occupiers including Hoare Lea; Gleeds and PureGym. A rare opportunity had arisen to secure premises on the prestigious West Wing within TCH. The accommodation extends to 2,200 sq ft (204 sq m) and is available from the beginning of 2021 and incorporates feature glazing as well as offering an abundance of natural day light. The suite also offers excellent environmental and sustainability ratings. The property is situated at the overlap of the retails, office, leisure and newly defined 'Innovation District' in Leeds City Centre. Town Centre House fronts several major bus routes and the main arterial road of Woodhouse Lane (to North Leeds), Great George St and Merrion St are close, as well as Albion Street. It is just a 10 minute walk to Leeds Railway Station. In addition to motorcycle parking and bicycle storage, there are 950 public car parking which also offers plenty of spaces for the charging of electronic vehicles through CitiCharge. This is located close to the Inner Ring Road for fast access to the rest of the city, M621 and the national motorway newtowrk beyond. The location has benefited from significant investment in recent years with the £60 million development of the First Direct Area which holds 13,500 people. This has acted as the catalyst for subsequent development projects with many new development projects nearby including residential, university facilities, hotels, offices and the Arena Quarter.

Following the huge success of Number One, the second office building at Kirkstall Forge is now available to pre-let. The building offers 195,000 sq ft of contemporary, flexible workspace, spread across two component parts, over seven floors and stunning roof terraces. Kirkstall Forge is the largest regeneration project in Leeds. Offices, homes, shops, cafés, bars, nature, walks and public spaces combine to create a place that truly welcomes everyone who lives, works and visits here. This is a place that brings you the best of the countryside and the best of the city. 2 Kirkstall Forge features the latest smart building technology with a light touch impact on the environment. Flexibility is the key word here, from the most flexible leasing products in the market, to the ability to grow and contract your space to meet the needs of your business. Kirkstall Forge has quickly become an established office location in Leeds, with a number of high profile occupiers choosing to locate here. The growing community can always be found in Butler’s, the contemporary cafe, bar and social space on the ground floor of the fully-let Number One. Only six minutes from the city centre, come and join the growing cohort of businesses who already enjoy working in these state-of-the-art buildings in this idyllic natural valley.
